ra-kotu.name: Ra Kotu
ra-kotu.description: First boss of HRC. Has Spinning mechanic which should be avoided, and Sword Assault mechanic which is basically ignored

kai.name: Yokeda Kai
kai.description: Upper second boss of HRC. Needs to be interrupted on cast, and has cloning mechanics - only original one is damaged

warrior.name: The Warrior
warrior.description: Last boss of HRC. Has big Cleave attack. Jump can be dodged. On Storm mechanics group should be unstacked to avoid getting too much damage. HM adds Gargoyls and Fossilize mechanic which can be synergised only and only when there are no teammates around
